column4: ok, I dont have windows installed on this computer so I cant determin that, but its not limited to captured video, all video seems to stop working, at least mpg and avi files
yes, I think so, since i started getting mythtv set up is when I noticed it
I had that happen like years ago... it was the nvidia driver that would screw up
what was your solution?
I think it only happened if i switched consoles or something, it eventually got fixed by updating nvidia driver... but that was long ago
if you use like mplayer -vo=xv filewhatever it still is all green?
would reinstalling the nvidia drivers help at all?
no idea
try different video outs with mplayer
xv is optimal but see if any do it
what do you mean different video outs?
mplayer can use differnt video output drivers
ok, how do I select different ones?
Gentoo = work
I just gavei t up after like 4 years i think
too much work lol
i selected x11 output and that worked
what does that mean?
x11 is 'slower' than xv
xv is hardware accelerated
if xv isn't working but x11 does its something screwy with the driver your using
ok, the video driver?
